Module com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication
Package com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication.service

Class CommandParser

java.lang.Object
com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication.service.CommandParser
public class CommandParser extends Object
The CommandParser class is responsible to perform all operation like identifying command and class that instance to perform operation.
Since:
v1.0

    • canvasId

      public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvasId

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandParser

      public CommandParser(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvasId, String commandSingle, String commandMultiple)
      Parameters:
      canvasId - canvas instance
      commandSingle - user provided single line of code.
      commandMultiple - user provided multiple line of code.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      this will process the run operation of command

    • syntax

      public void syntax()
      this will process the code for validation of syntax.

    • checkSingleOrMultiLineCodeAndProcessAccordingly

      public void checkSingleOrMultiLineCodeAndProcessAccordingly(CanvasUtil canvasUtil, boolean isThreadProcess)
      This method check the single or multiple line of code and gives priority to single line of code over multiple line of code.

    • processTheGivenInstruction

      public void processTheGivenInstruction(boolean isRunSingleLineCommand, String commandSingle, String commandMultiple, CanvasUtil canvasUtil, boolean innerEngineCall)
      Parameters:
      canvasUtil - canvasUtil instance
      commandSingle - user provided single line of code.
      commandMultiple - user provided multiple line of code.
      isRunSingleLineCommand - make which command to run
      innerEngineCall - flag to indicate call generate from loops or condition to run internally

    • processTheGivenInstruction

      public void processTheGivenInstruction(String command, CanvasUtil canvasUtil, boolean innerEngineCall)
      This method is responsible to split the instruction and get appropriate process instance CommandEnum to perform operation of particular command. And validate the code syntax and process it as per the event generate by the GPL application.

    • executeCoreEngine

      public static boolean executeCoreEngine(CanvasUtil canvasUtil, String[] commandSplit, int i)
      This method is responsible to perform actual process of GPL application. It is core engine for GPL application to execute the application logic.
